subject: RE: [junit] Re: JUnit test class reloading patch
msgSnippet: ... [snip] ... Hi Bill, Doh!  This is a great idea.  Using a URLClassLoader would allow us to remove a few methods from the custom class loader.  I ll rework
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bill Venners [mailto:bv@...]

[snip]

> JUnit tests, etc...) can be reloaded before each test. I
> think that's basically what you guys are talking about for
> JUnit, except that I used URLClassLoader not a custom class
> loader.

Hi Bill,

Doh! This is a great idea. Using a URLClassLoader would allow us to remove a few methods from the custom class loader. I'll rework the JUnit reloader this week to do so.

Best,
Scott Stirling
